## OlpDataProvider.getTile() method

Load the data of a \[\[Tile\]\] asynchronously in form of an \[\[ArrayBufferLike\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTile(tileKey: TileKey, abortSignal?: AbortSignal): Promise<ArrayBufferLike | {}>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | Address of a tile. |
|  abortSignal | AbortSignal | Optional AbortSignal to cancel the request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ArrayBufferLike \| {}&gt;

A promise delivering the data as an \[\[ArrayBufferLike\]\], or any object.
